archimate:Requirement.name: SOGP Sub-Point
archimate:Requirement.documentation:
This is an example SOGP Sub-Point. Its only purpose is to aid explaining the modelling structure in the view where it has been placed. An SOGP Sub-Point may be realized by one or more Control Measures or, in some cases, none at all.
A sub-point is part of an SOGP Stub. The sub-points are lettered using a), b), c) and so on.
